title: Container debug option not work with base image registry.access.redhat.com/ubi8/openjdk-17:1.17
body:
### Describe the bug

After updating the base image in Dockerfile to latest certified version registry.access.redhat.com/ubi8/openjdk-17:1.1**7**, the debug option for quarkus can no longer be activated.

With base image version registry.access.redhat.com/ubi8/openjdk-17:1.1**6**, the debug option works.


### Expected behavior

```
$ docker run -it --rm -e JAVA_DEBUG=true quarkus/code-with-quarkus-jvm

INFO exec -a "java" java -Dquarkus.http.host=0.0.0.0 -Djava.util.logging.manager=org.jboss.logmanager.LogManager -agentlib:jdwp=transport=dt_socket,server=y,suspend=n,address=5005 -XX:MaxRAMPercentage=50.0 -XX:+UseParallelGC -XX:MinHeapFreeRatio=10 -XX:MaxHeapFreeRatio=20 -XX:GCTimeRatio=4 -XX:AdaptiveSizePolicyWeight=90 -XX:+ExitOnOutOfMemoryError -cp "." -jar /deployments/quarkus-run.jar 
Listening for transport dt_socket at address: 5005
INFO running in /deployments
```

### Actual behavior

```
$ docker run -it --rm -e JAVA_DEBUG=true quarkus/code-with-quarkus-jvm

INFO exec -a "java" java -Dquarkus.http.host=0.0.0.0 -Djava.util.logging.manager=org.jboss.logmanager.LogManager -cp "." -jar /deployments/quarkus-run.jar 
INFO running in /deployments
```

### How to Reproduce?

Reproducer

Steps to reproduce the behaviour:
1. Generate simple quarkus project ("Generate your application")
2. Change image tag in FROM line in src/main/docker/Dockerfile.jvm to 1.17 
3. Build project with `./mvnw package`
4. Build docker image with `docker build -f src/main/docker/Dockerfile.jvm -t quarkus/code-with-quarkus-jvm .`
5. Start container with debug option: `docker run -it --rm -e JAVA_DEBUG=true quarkus/code-with-quarkus-jvm`
6. Check log output. 

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

Linux .... 5.15.0-83-generic #92-Ubuntu SMP Mon Aug 14 09:30:42 UTC 2023 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux

### Output of `java -version`

openjdk version "17.0.8.1" 2023-08-24 OpenJDK Runtime Environment (build 17.0.8.1+1-Ubuntu-0ubuntu122.04) OpenJDK 64-Bit Server VM (build 17.0.8.1+1-Ubuntu-0ubuntu122.04, mixed mode, sharing)

### GraalVM version (if different from Java)

_No response_

### Quarkus version or git rev

3.3.2

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

Apache Maven 3.8.7 (b89d5959fcde851dcb1c8946a785a163f14e1e29) Maven home: /opt/maven/current Java version: 17.0.8.1, vendor: Private Build, runtime: /usr/lib/jvm/java-17-openjdk-amd64 Default locale: de_DE, platform encoding: UTF-8 OS name: "linux", version: "5.15.0-83-generic", arch: "amd64", family: "unix"

### Additional information

_No response_
